Function reference

All functions

LPS_session
LPS Basketball Session Dataset
coef(<shorts_model>)
S3 method for extracting model parameters from shorts_model object
confint(<shorts_model>)
S3 method for providing confidence intervals for the shorts_model
convert_FVP()
Convert Force-Velocity profile back to Acceleration-Velocity profile
create_FVP()
Create Force-Velocity Profile
create_sprint_trace()
Create Sprint Trace
create_timing_gates_splits()
Create Timing Gates Splits
dynaspeed
DynaSpeed Single Sprint Data
find_peak_power_distance() find_peak_power_time() find_velocity_critical_distance() find_velocity_critical_time() find_acceleration_critical_distance() find_acceleration_critical_time() find_power_critical_distance() find_power_critical_time()
Find functions
find_optimal_distance()
Function that finds the distance at which the sprint, probe, or FV profile is optimal (i.e., equal to 100 perc)
fitted(<shorts_model>)
S3 method for returning predictions of shorts_model
format_splits()
Format Split Data
get_air_resistance()
Get Air Resistance
jb_morin
JB Morin Sample Dataset
laser_gun_data
Laser Gun Data
model_in_situ() model_radar_gun() model_laser_gun() model_tether() model_tether_DC() model_time_distance() model_time_distance_FD() model_time_distance_FD_fixed() model_time_distance_TC() model_time_distance_DC() model_time_distance_TC_DC() model_timing_gates() model_timing_gates_TC() model_timing_gates_FD() model_timing_gates_FD_fixed() model_timing_gates_DC() model_timing_gates_TC_DC()
Model functions
optimal_FV() optimal_MSS_MAC()
Optimal profile functions
plot(<shorts_model>)
S3 method for plotting shorts_model object
predict(<shorts_model>)
S3 method for making predictions using shorts_model
predict_velocity_at_time() predict_distance_at_time() predict_acceleration_at_time() predict_time_at_distance() predict_time_at_distance_FV() predict_velocity_at_distance() predict_acceleration_at_distance() predict_acceleration_at_velocity() predict_air_resistance_at_time() predict_air_resistance_at_distance() predict_force_at_velocity() predict_force_at_time() predict_force_at_distance() predict_power_at_distance() predict_power_at_time() predict_relative_power_at_distance() predict_relative_power_at_time() predict_work_till_time() predict_work_till_distance() predict_kinematics()
Kinematics prediction functions
print(<shorts_model>)
S3 method for printing shorts_model object
probe_FV() probe_MSS_MAC()
Probe profile functions
radar_gun_data
Radar Gun Data
residuals(<shorts_model>)
S3 method for returning residuals of shorts_model
split_times
Split Testing Data
summary(<shorts_model>)
S3 method for providing summary for the shorts_model object
vescovi
Vescovi Timing Gates Sprint Times
